greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: T(n,k)=Number of nXk 0..3 arrays with values 0..3 introduced in row major order and no element equal to any horizontal or vertical neighbor.
comment: Number of colorings of the grid graph P_n X P_k using a maximum of 4 colors up to permutation of the colors. - _Andrew Howroyd_, Jun 26 2017
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..496 (terms 1..180 from R. H. Hardin)
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Grid Graph
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Vertex Coloring
example: Some solutions with all values from 0 to 3 for n=6 k=4
xref: Cf. A207997 (3 colorings), A222444 (labeled 4 colorings), A198906 (5 colorings), A198982 (6 colorings), A198723 (7 colorings), A198914 (8 colorings), A207868 (unlimited).
results.author: _R. H. Hardin_, Oct 29 2011
